item.description: In 2009, I was working with a group of friends at a small software agency. We had a cheap office in downtown Halifax. The building was not in great shape, but the offices were well below market price because the place kept threatening to be turned into condos.

item.title: Reimagining Pong Wars with C# and MVUX
item.description: Build a cross-platform Pong Wars game using C# and MVUX with Uno Platform. It dives into the game's architecture, state management, and core mechanics, along with the advantages of immutability for data integrity. Learn how C# markup simplifies UI development, MVUX facilitates state management, and immutable records safeguard data integrity.
item.author: (Uno Platform Team)
